title: PSYC 331 Forensic Psychology
description: The application of psychological theory and research to legal issues and the criminal justice system. Credit will not be granted for both PSYC 331 and PSYC 430.
prerequisites: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) all of PSYC 101, PSYC 102. (or (c) 6 credits of 200-level psychology (but not PSYC 205 or 263).)
